title: The $1,000 Trump Account for newborns: Who is eligible, how to apply and what comes next
summary_full: A new government initiative will provide a $1,000 Trump Account for children born between January 1, 2025, and December 31, 2028. This investment account, designed for long-term growth until age 18, aims to encourage early investing. Families can add their own contributions, with potential for significant growth depending on market performance and consistent funding.
